name: Superior Rune of the Eagle
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Ferocity; deal 10% increased strike damage to targets with less than 50% health.

name: Superior Rune of the Krait
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +20% Bleeding Duration; inflict bleeding, torment, and poison to nearby foes for 8 seconds after using an elite skill . <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Grawl Slaying
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
+7% Strike Damage vs. Grawl
+3% Strike Damage

name: Superior Sigil of Hologram Slaying
description:
Element: Pain
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
+17% Strike Damage vs. Dragon Bash Holograms
+3% Strike Damage

name: Superior Sigil of Force
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: +5% Damage

name: Dolyak Race Flyer
description: Marcus challenges you to be the fastest racer to climb the Labyrinthine Cliffs!

name: Superior Sigil of Energy
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Gain 50% of your endurance when you swap to this weapon while in combat. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 9 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Frailty
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Inflict 2 stacks of vulnerability for 8 seconds after striking a foe from behind or the flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of Durability
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +10% Maximum Health; grant nearby allies protection and regeneration for 3 seconds, and resistance for 1 second when struck. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 20 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Rune of the Undead
description:
Element: Brilliance
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +125 Toughness; convert 7% of your toughness into condition damage.

name: Superior Rune of the Revenant
description:
Element: Potence
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: +18 to All Stats; gain 2 seconds of resistance after using a healing skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 10 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Transference
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Healing to other allies is increased by 10%.

name: Gift of Sigils
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of Sigils, a Gift of Condensed Magic, a Gift of Condensed Might, and a Gift of Craftsmanship to create a legendary sigil.

name: Zephyr Koi Lantern
description: Deposit this decoration in the guild's decoration storage.

name: Superior Rune of the Weaver
description:

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; gain barrier after executing a <c=@abilitytype>Stance</c> ability.

buff.description:

buff.description: Recharge all equipped skills by 2 seconds upon killing an enemy. <c=@reminder>Cooldown: 10 seconds</c>

buff.description: Cripple a foe for 2 seconds after striking from its flank. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 5 Seconds)</c>

description:

bonuses: +125 Healing Power; gain barrier when struck by a foe while below 75% health. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 75 Seconds)</c>

name: Starborn Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Your endurance is refilled each time you kill a foe.

description:

bonuses: +10% Condition Duration; convert up to 3 conditions into boons after using an elite skill. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 45 Seconds)</c>

buff.description:

bonuses: +20% Protection Duration; when struck by a foe, a meadow blooms at your location, granting vigor, regeneration, and protection to allies within it. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 90 Seconds)</c>

name: Superior Sigil of Bloodlust
description:
Element: Enhancement
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
Gain a charge of +10 power each time you kill a foe, five charges if you kill an enemy player. (Max 25 stacks; ends on down.)
(Only one attribute-stacking sigil can be active at a time.)

name: Noble Courtier Outfit

Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.
